extendedInfo.description: Nedbank is proud to bring you the Nedbank App Suite, which provides you with a one of a kind, customisable and accessible banking, financial services and lifestyle mobile experience.No matter where you are (on your life path, on the go), Nedbank ensures youâre financially equipped for success.FEATURES INCLUDE:â  BANKING â A variety of banking functions can be performed using the Nedbank App Suiteâ  SHARE TRADING â Access to your Share trading portfolioâ  NETBANK BUSINESS â Tailormade anytime, anywhere electronic banking for businessâ  LOCATORS â Find Nedbank Branches or ATMs nearest to youâ  FOREX RATES â View FOREX rates of various currencies and calculate FOREX ratesâ  CONTACT US â A list of important Nedbank Contact Numbersâ  APPLICATION FORMS â Apply for a Nedbank productâ  CUSTOMISATION â Manage your application and customise a unique user experience.This application can be downloaded by anyone.  In order to use the banking functionality on this application you need to bank with the Nedbank Group.

reviews.title: Almost great
reviews.comment: The app works most of the time and I am very happy with the banking facilities that I make use of. There are issues with securing a connection over certain WiFi networks and the app seems to force you into offline mode when it can\'t connect (the offline mode is an empty screen). Why even offer such an option?! I think this app shows a lot of potential and can become great.
reviews.author: Jaco Hamilton-Attwell

reviews.title: Simple and complete
reviews.comment: Has everything I need. The UI works logically and has all the functionality I require. Some issues with app crashing but they have been resolved.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Really sucks  SGS2
reviews.comment: Used to be agret app. Unusable for the past few weeks. This is unexceptable from an institution of this magnitude. Says upgrade needed. I have uninstalled and reinstalled but still not working. Does anyone at Nedbank care about their clients? This might cause me to switch to another bank!
reviews.author: Len Naude

reviews.title: Been offline for months
reviews.comment: I installed the app when it was first launched, in general it seemed to work well and I have no complaints however, the app no longer works and the login / banking icon has now been replaced by an \"Upgrade Notification\" Icon which simply states that the app is being upgraded and has been like this for months. I am also not able to access the https Netbank site from my phone, have even tried installing another browser but have the same issue! As it stands I am unable to do any banking whatsoever from my mobile device which is somewhat frustrating!   An organisation the size of Nedcor should\'t have issues like this and to be frank I find it pretty poor on their part, their banking app was late to get to the market and only functional for a short while before it was withdrawn.
reviews.author: Paul Jatho

reviews.title: Good and useful app, but update?
reviews.comment: It\'s a rather good app and I easily manage what I need to... when it works... For two weeks now it just displays an \"update warning\" when I open it saying a new update will be available soon. When will this update finally be up and running? Using the web interface has now become highly inconvenient and so I would like to be able to use this app again.
reviews.author: Marco da Fonseca

reviews.title: Very good functionality, but some problems
reviews.comment: I really enjoy the functionality provided by this app, but there is one major problem for me. I use this app as a means of doing my banking faster than I would in a browser, but instead it takes a lot longer because every single screen requires loading. I myself am studying interface design and I can easily say that this single problem makes the interface far too frustrating for me to want to use the app. If I want to purchase airtime, I have to wait for the screen to load, then I have to wait to select my service provider, wait to select the type of service I want to purchase and then wait once I have confirmed the transaction. Something definitely needs to be done about this, because banking apps are becoming the norm and if the app isn\'t good enough, customers are going to get very frustrated.
reviews.author: Annique le Roux

reviews.title: This is the shit! :-)
reviews.comment: I laugh at some idiots on this blog...if it crashes upon.open, re install it idiots. Its probably ur crap phone. Im on S3 ...fucking awesone. OK...it  needs some 3D icons n needs memory in forms to remember what cell numbers were entered.Sux to always have to re enter cells to load airtime.  I think make it about like 22 mb large..pimp the shit out of it n keep it stable same time. People dont really care how large it is likw one mp3 track is 7mb...so yall can expand. I cant wait for NFC. Nb153049...:-)
reviews.author: Francois Joubert

reviews.title: Broken on 4.3
reviews.comment: Logged a call 3 weeks ago about the application being broken. Got a reference but nothing has been done.   Phoning into Nedbank is a pointless exercise as they take no responsibility and say they cannot tell me when it is going to be fixed.  Poor service from them and seemingly un-phased that this service does not work, yet are surprised when customers are unhappy.
reviews.author: Oliver Rivett-Carnac

reviews.title: Poor - Unreliable
reviews.comment: It took Nedbank about 2 months to sort out the mess created by their last \"update\" during which time the app has been unusable. Schoolboy stuff. Makes one wonder how secure it is.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Really useful, but broken since Android 4.3 update
reviews.comment: The app force closes every time after submitting my pin in the Banking section.This started after updating to Android 4.3 on a Nexus 4. I tried reinstalling and reactivating, but the issue persists.
reviews.author: Braam Genis

reviews.comment: Given up trying, can\'t connect. Attempt #12+
reviews.author: Thayn Niemand

reviews.title: Nice and working again
reviews.comment: Enquires, transfer , future transfer and more just like on the secure website and feels safe as well.App is working great again thank you
reviews.author: Hein Bester

reviews.title: Slow
reviews.comment: The app keeps showing loading after each option you select for about 3 seconds. Very irritating and can be made much more responsive.
reviews.author: Zackie de Beer

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Best app ever
reviews.author: Lydon Harriparsad

reviews.title: Not good enough
reviews.comment: Showing bank statement as a mini statement helps no one. How can I work with 10 entries
reviews.author: Kallie Koortz

reviews.title: Better than Internet Banking
reviews.comment: Second only to Whatsapp in terms of usefullness. Fast and reliable.  Sometimes it can\'t connect, but I rate that\'s an Android problem. It\'s rare too.
reviews.author: Ludwig Schmidt

reviews.title: Fix it
reviews.comment: I can\'t get into my app as it says there\'s a download coming. Its been weeks now and i still can\'t get in !!! Fix this !!!
reviews.author: Gene Graff

reviews.title: please help
reviews.comment: how do i re-activate my passkey? because i lost the code and i got a new passkey but it says invalid and that i must re-activate it.
reviews.author: Morne Killian

reviews.title: Really great
reviews.comment: Looking forward to the new version.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not lekker anymore
reviews.comment: Force closes all the time now on my Desire HD. Please fix it ASAP.
reviews.author: A Google User
